articles.title: Gold prices surge ahead of Onam as ECB cuts rates and Fed decision looms
articles.description: Gold has become precious ahead of Onam, a festival celebrated in Kerala which falls on September 15. As the European Central Bank (ECB) cut the rate by a 25 basis point yesterday, gold and silver prices are showing an upward trajectory.

articles.title: Revenge buying of gold softens after import duty cut, prices surge near Rs 74,000
articles.description: Revenge buying of gold after the cut in import duty has softened with jewellers reporting a up to 15 per cent drop in demand as prices surged nearing the Rs 74,000 per 10 gm mark. The price of gold on Monday was hovering around Rs 73,733 per 10 gm.

articles.title: Diwali Premium Cart: More Indians ordering AI washing machines and smart ACs this festive season
articles.description: Premium products like AI-enabled washing machines and smart ACs are driving festive shopping demands, surpassing the mass segment. Brands are offering flexible payment schemes to mitigate inflation's impact. A good monsoon has partially revived rural incomes,…
